title: The Evolution Of Earworms: Researchers Track History Of Pop Music
teaser: For the last half century, pop music has evolved from blues to disco to hip-hop. By digitally analyzing more than 17,000 songs, a team at Queen Mary University of London has released a study showing how pop music has changed throughout history.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
